name: Dord
description: Welcome to a strange 16-bit style world where you, Midy, are a small and inexperienced ghost who's only dream is to become a knight! Have duels with unique monsters, collect weapons, explore a world inhabited by strange people, solve puzzles, and finally reach the goal that inspired you in the first place! This simple, short and casual adventure with RPG elements still manages to provide a little bit of challenge and fun!
